eutros.multiblocktweaker.crafttweaker.gtwrap.interfaces

Interface IBlockWorldState


  • public interface IBlockWorldState
    Similar to an IBlockState, but bound to a position and world, and holding extra information about the match taking place.
    ZenClass:
    mods.gregtech.multiblock.IBlockWorldState
